name: Bone Hunter
description:
We're back!

After a long time of silence, we are back with a simple, but more polished game.

In this platformer you play as a wolf running in a mountain-filled landscape, searching for a bone and a door. The bone acts like a key and must be found and collected before the door to the next level opens.

Currently there are only 3 levels, no menu- or endscreen, but we'll get to that. If you still want to make the most out of it, there are a total of 39 coins to collect.. good luck finding them!

Controls:

W, A, D and Space - left, right and jump

F - interact with doors

If you have thoughts about the game, please share them in the comments, as we are using this engine the first time, we'ld like to improve our techniques from the start on.
